title: tactic
description: A function from an imported library.

name.description: The primary name for the ATT&CK tactic.

desc.description: A description of the ATT&CK tactic.

url.description: The URL that documents the ATT&CK tactic.

tag.description: The synapse tag used to annotate nodes included in this ATT&CK tactic.

references.description: An array of URLs that document the ATT&CK tactic.
